    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    Generic abstract DAO class that provides common database operations for any model type.
    Bill
     
    BillController
    Controller class for displaying bills in the BillView table Fetches all bills using BillDAO and shows them using reflection
    BillDAO
    Data Access Object for handling operations related to the Bill entity Bills are stored in the 'log' table and are immutable Only insert and read operations are allowed
    BillView
    GUI class for viewing all generated bills Displays a table of all bills stored in the database
    Client
    Represents a Clients in th system Contains clients specific info
    ClientBLL
    Business Logic Layer for the Client entity Provides methods for searching and managing clients Connects database operations with the graphical user interface
    ClientController
    Controller class for managing client related actions in th GUI Handles interaction between the ClientView and the business logic layer ClientBLL
    ClientDAO
    Data Access Object for the client entity Inherits generic operations from AbstractDAO
    ClientView
    GUI class responsible for displaying and managing client related data Provides input fields, buttons, and a table to add, edit, delete, and view all clients from the database
    ConnectionFactory
    ConnectionFactory is a singleton class that manages database connections.
    Main
     
    MainController
    The Maincontroller handles user interaction from the MainView This class acts as the main navigator controller in the app
    MainView
    The main GUI window for the Orders ManagementSystem this is the first window showed to user when the app starts
    Order
    Represents an order placed by a client for a product Contains info about the client, product, quantity and order ID
    OrderBLL
    Business Logic Layer class that handles operations related to orders It communicates with the OrderDAO for database access and generates a Bill for each order
    OrderController
    Controller class that manages the logic for handling orders in the application
    OrderDAO
    Data Access Object for the order entity Inherits generic operations from AbstractDAO
    OrderView
    GUI class for managing and placing orders Provides a form for selecting a clients and product, entering a quantity, and placing an order.
    ProducBLL
    Bussimess Logic Layer that handles operations related to product Provides methods for finding, inserting, updating and deleting products
    Product
    Represent a product in the system Contains details about the product
    ProductController
    Controller class responsilble for handling user interactions related to products
    ProductDAO
    Data Access Object for the product entity Inherits generic operations from AbstractDAO
    ProductView
    GUI class for managing products
    TableGenerator
    Utility class used for dynamically populating a JTable model using reflection to extract fields and values from a generic object list This helps avoid writing repetitive code when displaying different model objects in a table
    TestConnection
